snippet: In a report released Wednesday, Physicians for Human Rights chronicled 45 attacks on medical facilities in Aleppo since 2012, mostly by Syrian government forces.
abstract: Physicians for Human Rights believes Syrian government forces are deliberately attacking medical facilities and personnel; releases report chronicling 45 attacks on medical facilities in Aleppo since 2012; such attacks would constitute war crime.
lead_paragraph: In a report released Wednesday, Physicians for Human Rights chronicled 45 attacks on medical facilities in Aleppo since 2012, mostly by Syrian government forces.

headline.main: Syria Accused of Attacks on Medical Facilities and Personnel
headline.print_headline: Syria Accused of Attacks on Medical Facilities and Personnel

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
